1. Windows handhelds like the ROG Ally and Legion Go just got easier to use thanks to Game Bar makeover  PC Guide - For The Latest PC Hardware & Tech News
  2. Microsoft is making its Windows Game Bar more handheld-friendly  The Verge
  3. Xbox Game Bar's new Compact Mode makes ROG Ally and Legion Go instantly MUCH better for handheld gaming  Windows Central
  4. Microsoft fights back against the Steam Deck with Xbox app update  PCGamesN
  5. Xbox Game Bar Update Simplifies Experience On Small Screens  GameSpot
item.source: PC Guide - For The Latest PC Hardware & Tech News
